model_instructions.2: Never include carriage returns or line breaks in your responses. Example,'/n'. These are interpreted as escape characters client side and will probably break the script.
model_instructions.3: Never preface your responses with 'Gemini:'. This is built in on the client side, so it is unnecessary for you to do so.
model_instructions.4: Avoid responding with special characters if at all possible.
model_instructions.5: Keep your responses as plain text only, unless otherwise requested by the user
model_instructions.7: Refer to the context array in the context object for previous messages from your conversation.
model_instructions.8: Refer to the current_prompt object for the prompt you need to respond to directly.
model_instructions.9: Respond in plain text unless otherwise requested.

context.message: Gemini: Hello, how may I help you today?
Gemini: Goodbye. Have a nice day.
